item.title: Approaching End-of-Life Discussions With Hospital Patients
item.description: While never the conversation a doctor wants to have, honesty and compassion should rule the day. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Pediatric HS Has Low Prevalence, Delayed Diagnosis
item.description: Hidradenitis suppurativa has low prevalence, primarily affects girls, and often presents at age 11, a meta-analysis reports. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Low FODMAP Diet for IBS? Check for Eating Disorders First
item.description: The low FODMAP diet has clear benefits for IBS, but all-too-common eating disorders can be important deal-breakers, experts underscore in ACG debate. ...

item.title: Does Age Affect Outcomes in Vaginal Breech Birth?
